Review original: We were recommended this restaurant and before we arrived in Barcelona, we tried to reserve a table for a group of 6 twice by sending  them emails, no reply....SHAME!
Translated Review: We were recommended this restaurant and before we arrived in Barcelona, we tried to reserve a table for a group of 6 twice by sending  them emails, no reply....SHAME!

Review original: It was freezing in there. Did not enjoy their choice for a loud hiphop music. Did not love that they had no green tea (unheard of for a Japanese restaurant to not have a hot tea). Did not like that the place was so uncomfortable,...could not wait to leave. Thought WTF with all the stellar reviews? Made me think: what? really? Nevertheless, the servers were nice, friendly. Hope your experience is better than mine. -pMore
Translated Review: It was freezing in there. Did not enjoy their choice for a loud hiphop music. Did not love that they had no green tea (unheard of for a Japanese restaurant to not have a hot tea). Did not like that the place was so uncomfortable,...could not wait to leave. Thought WTF with all the stellar reviews? Made me think: what? really? Nevertheless, the servers were nice, friendly. Hope your experience is better than mine. -pMore

Review original:
Good gnocchi, smiling Chef BUT 3 mistakes in our order, forgot one dish for one of the kids. Waiter not friendly at all. Made the experience very disappointing. 
We were probably just unlucky…

Good gnocchi, smiling Chef BUT 3 mistakes in our order, forgot one dish for one of the kids. Waiter not friendly at all. Made the experience very disappointing. 
We were probably just unlucky…
